room_title: Escape room "Game of Stones" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: Our family had a lot of fun. This was our first escape room experience. The staff was friendly and gave us hints when we needed them. I would recommend you try Escape Rooms FL.

room_title: Escape room "Game of Stones" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: Visited this amazing GEM in Broward County. We did two rooms, the Game of Stones and Blackbeard's Brig.  Great puzzles, no padlocks, electronics to a new level.  Owners were welcoming and helpful and the lobby was so cool.  Highly recommend.  Can't wait to try out their Jungle room.  Will be back!!

room_title: Escape room "Game of Stones" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: This has got to be the one of the best escape room! It was my son's first escape room and we escaped! I recommend this escape room for people who had atleast 3 escape room experience.

room_title: Escape room "Game of Stones" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: My wife surprised me with going to an escape room.  Having done a few before entering the business I was impressed with the decor and attention to detail.  I thought they were a franchise however family owned business.  My family of 8 entering the Game of Stones was very impressed to the medieval theme.  Very intricate puzzles and we all needed to work together.  We did not escape in time but the memories were well worth it.  Will visit again.

room_title: Escape room "Game of Stones" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: My family had an absolutely memorable and amazing experience! The hour flew by solving puzzles and clues to escape! The owners and staff provided amazing service. The attention to detail and decor throughout is commended.  One of the cleanest escape rooms we have visited.  A fan of medieval themes the room blew me away with surprises.  Will go back to visit their other rooms and a must for all.

room_title: Escape room "Game of Stones" by Escape Rooms FL in Miami
review: Went to this new escape room for our girls night out.  Tried many escape rooms and from beginning to end it was an amazing experience.  Owners and staff provided excellent service.  The room was walking into a medieval castle and theme with technology was one we had not yet experienced with other escape rooms.  A must do for all!  Will be going back next month with our ladies night out to experience the Jungle.  Recommended to all!
